basics.name: Rodrigo Tomé Nieto
basics.label: Front End Lead with over 6 years of experience focused on performance and code quality.
basics.summary: With over 6 years of professional experience and a broad background in web development, I stand out for my continuous update on the latest technological trends. Passionate about technology, I enjoy exploring emerging tools. My expertise includes Next.js, Storybook, TypeScript, and Tailwind. As a team leader, I encourage individual development to achieve maximum collective performance.

work.name: Globant Create
work.summary:
In my role as a Front End Lead, I guide development teams, establish high-quality code standards, and continuously improve the developer experience. I am actively involved in developing critical project components, providing targeted support, and fostering the professional growth of my fellow developers.

Among my key achievements, I led the front-end development for the world's first integration of Mirakl with WordPress, a complex project that was notably one of the few delivered on schedule. Currently, as the Tech Lead for the Fusion AI project, I am driving initiatives that increase the value our solutions provide to clients.

work.name: Globant Create
work.summary: In my early days in the company, I worked on development with Wordpress, PHP, and SASS. Over time, I participated in increasingly relevant projects and provided support in various initiatives. Progressively, I led the modernization of the stack towards Next.js, React, and TypeScript, specializing in these technologies.
